Module com.boslott
Package com.boslott.controller

Class AppointmentsUpdateSceneController

java.lang.Object
com.boslott.controller.AppointmentsUpdateSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentsUpdateSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class for the Appointments Update Scene
Author:
Steven Slott

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AppointmentsUpdateSceneController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cancel()
    Clears all the inputs, changes the application current Appointment to null, and changes the application main Stage Scene
    void clear()
    This method clears all input controls, sets the appointmentToUpdate value to null, and sets the application currentAppointment value to null
    void clearEndTime()
    This method clears the input controls for the endStartDate
    java.lang.Boolean createNew()
    Creates a new Appointment entry in a data source.
    void delete()
    Deletes an Appointment entry from a data source.
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
    Initializes this controller class.
    void update()
    Updates an existing Appointment in a data source.
    static java.sql.Timestamp utcToLocalTimestamp​(java.sql.Timestamp utcTime)
    This method converts the provided UTC Timestamp and returns the same-point-in-time Timestamp for the user's local time zone
    void validateChosenDateTimes()
    This method directs the process of validating the chosen startDateTime and the chosen endDateTime to ensure the times are within EST business hours, that the start comes before the end, and that the times do not cross over into multiple days

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentsUpdateSceneController

      public AppointmentsUpdateSceneController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
      Initializes this controller class. Lambda expressions are used for the event handlers to set the actions for the date-time-related input controls. The onAction methods accept a functional interface, an event handler, so a lambda expression is used
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      rb -

    • createNew

      public java.lang.Boolean createNew() throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a new Appointment entry in a data source. This method directs validation of all required inputs, communicating with a data source via a Data Access Object, and clearing and changing the application's main Stage Scene
      Returns:
      true if a new Appointment entry is successfully completed, false if the process does not successfully complete
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an error occurs with loading the FXML

    • update

      public void update() throws java.io.IOException
      Updates an existing Appointment in a data source. This method directs the process of updating the Appointment, ensuring validating takes place of the user input, setting/removing error messages on the UI, communicating with the AppointmentDAO to update the Appointment entry, and clearing and changing the application main Stage Scene
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an error occurs with loading the FXML

    • delete

      public void delete() throws java.io.IOException
      Deletes an Appointment entry from a data source. This method directs the process of deleting an Appointment entry from a UCertify database, ensuring validation takes place, setting/clearing UI error messages, communicating with the DAO, and clearing and changing the application main Stage Scene
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an error occurs with loading the FXML

    • cancel

      public void cancel() throws java.io.IOException
      Clears all the inputs, changes the application current Appointment to null, and changes the application main Stage Scene
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an error occurs with loading the FXML

    • utcToLocalTimestamp

      public static java.sql.Timestamp utcToLocalTimestamp​(java.sql.Timestamp utcTime)
      This method converts the provided UTC Timestamp and returns the same-point-in-time Timestamp for the user's local time zone
      Parameters:
      utcTime - the UTC Timestamp to convert to local time zone
      Returns:
      a Timestamp of the provided UTC Timestamp, converted to the user's local time zone

    • validateChosenDateTimes

      public void validateChosenDateTimes()
      This method directs the process of validating the chosen startDateTime and the chosen endDateTime to ensure the times are within EST business hours, that the start comes before the end, and that the times do not cross over into multiple days

    • clear

      public void clear()
      This method clears all input controls, sets the appointmentToUpdate value to null, and sets the application currentAppointment value to null

    • clearEndTime

      public void clearEndTime()
      This method clears the input controls for the endStartDate
